Document.Focus: The day of your surgery - adult

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about The day of your surgery - adult
QAPair.Answer: You are scheduled to have surgery. Learn about what to expect on the day of surgery so that you will be prepared. The surgeon's office will let you know what time you should arrive on the day of surgery. This may be early in the morning. If you are having minor surgery, you will go home afterward on the same day., If you are having major surgery, you will stay in the hospital after the surgery, although in some cases you may be able to go home afterward on the same day.,
